thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 29 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Xinjiang Sailing Information Technology sees FY 2017 net profit up 75 pct to 95 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Xinjiang Sailing Information Technology sees FY 2017 net profit up 75 pct to 95 pct

organizations.name: xinjiang sailing information technology co ltd

text:
Jan 30(Reuters) - Xinjiang Sailing Information Technology Co Ltd
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to increase by 75 percent to 95 percent, or to be 74.5 million yuan to 83.1 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 42.6 million yuan
* Says increased income from main business is the main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/zvYuHk
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
